reviews.review: I am a little behind on starting Portal, but I've constantly heard how excellent this game game was. I bought it on sale and it was worth every penny and then some. Although it is a relatively short game, the levels are fun and challenging. Also, the dialogue is beautiful and will stick with you long after your first play-through. This is a must have for any gaming collection.
Excelent game, majestic in almost every aspect, highly recomended. You can't call yourself a gamer if you haven't played Portal

A very interesting gameplay concept, but I found it a little short. It only took me around 3 hours to complete the main storyline, but there are also bonus levels and developer commentary that should provide extra playtime.

Portal Is a Amazing game. The best puzzle solving Physics using game I have played, 

Info: This game is more of a introduction on how to use the portal gun and the AI GLaDOS and the Fall of Aperture science laboratories. Finish this game then make sure to buy Portal 2 for ever better puzzles and chalenging talks and in my mind a slightly more interactive storyline with more characters

Portal 2: http://store.steampowered.com/app/620

I would thoroughly recommend this game to anybody wanting something just a little bit different. The writing is absolutely pitch perfect with the dry, macabre monologues of GLaDOS, the Labs robotic overseer, offsetting the wonderful (if not infuriating!) level design.

Top it off with a promise of cake; a party in your name and a chance to see the outside world; you will be eager to see this game to its end.

My only criticism about the game is that I personally found the main story a little too short, although the added challenges the game has can give you significantly more hours of gameplay (especially if you're awful at the game like I am!).

Um dos melhores jogos de 2007 continua sendo um dos melhores jogos até hoje!

O carinho com o qual os desenvolvedores criaram Portal é perceptível: a escrita inteligente; o desenho dos níveis elegante, nunca difíceis a ponto de você ficar travado mas nunca fáceis ao ponto de você ficar entediado; o jogo é praticamente livre de glitches e bugs; a história, contada aos poucos e indiretamente, é interessante e te faz ficar investido no jogo. Isso sem falar na GLaDOS, um dos melhores personagens de jogo já criados.

Charmoso, elegante, divertido. Se tem uma falha, é acabar cedo demais, e te deixar querendo mais.

10/10
este juego aunque corto (3,7 h) es muy entretenido y el final solo se ve superado por la sorpresa del Portal II

100% recomendado si te gusta "comerte el coco" con rompecabezas de portales Y SOBRE TODO si lo cojes en oferta, pagar más de 4 € no lo recomendaria.
---
+ Divertido.
+ El tema de telentrasnporte entre portales esta muy bien, marea un poco (segun como coloques los portales) pero esta muy bien.
+ Esta traducido en muchos idiomas, tanto en texto como en voces.
---
- La duración es muy corta, 3 horas, sin contar extras.
- La historia es buena y divertida pero las situaciones criticas, como por ejemplo contra "el jefe final" el combate es ridiculo.
Amazing

I finally understand all the hype, I really enjoyed this game and its originality. Although the puzzles are relatively challenging, the game itself seemed quite short. That's not a problem though because I'm now playing through the sequel :).
Sehr schwieriges Puzzlespiel das einen so richtig "Brain f u c k ed" mit diesen Portalen. Da muss man echt viel überlegen.

Played this several times now...
The interesting puzzles and GLaDOS's narration make this game like butter - smooth and bad for your heart.
Seriously, some of the puzzles were really challenging and I felt as though my heart would stop a few times.
Totally thrilling to play, with simple controls and pleasing graphics.
If you haven't bought this yet, you are torturing yourself because it's great.
Someone said there would be cake.

By far the best thing ever built on the half-life engine. Revolutionary experiment on gaming phsyics, with humor & a decent story to boot! Quick game, but worth picking up; at least to finally realize all the 'cake' jokes your friends have been making ;-)
Still one of the best ending credits to any game ever made... oh, and the game's pretty great itself.
Muito bom porém muito curto.
I heard a lot about this game, so when it was at a hugh discount on the Steam Summer sale from last year, i choose to buy it. I did not really enjoy the game. I guess this is not my type of game.
An excellent puzzle game. Great puzzles, setting and humor. Definitely on the easier side. Highly recommended if you want to enjoy some casual puzzle-solving.
Un clasico, imposible no jugarlo, ideal para comprar de oferta y tener un gran juego por poca plata
I didn't trust Portal at first since it didn't have any actual guns. I couldn't be more wrong, this game is a must-have in all aspects.
Juego original y divertido donde los haya, si no lo has probado, deberías.
A relly great game.
I miss my companion cube.

Portal is a wonderful game that I thoroughly enjoy and would play time and time again. First off, the graphics, level design, environment... All perfect! Together, it all creates a chilling feeling that, though I played it in a room with three other people around me, I felt alone. Portal is great at making the player feel alone and yet surrounded by others.

The wonderful voices of our AI and the turrets makes the metal world around the player feel populated and one craves the sound of bots when there is silence, to reassure the player that the silent piston they saw in the corner of their eye wasn't some entity of Aperture Science, crawling around and trying to scare the player.

The gameplay is great, though the story a bit too short for my liking, but still a great story!

TL;DR, I love this game! A strong recommendation for both casual and hardcore gamers alike!

Curto, mas vale a pena. Se encaixou perfeitamente na expectativa criada pelos fãs do jogo. 
Agora é só partir para o segundo.
story is quite short and the puzzles are quite easy overall, i still enjoyed myself playing this
画面を急に動かす必要性があまりないので一人称視点のゲームが初めての人やなれない人にもオススメできます

Portal history is about a experiment wich you wake up in the future and don't know what happened with past, present now even the future. So you need understand where did you get and find a way out of everything they put you on. You find a weapon who can make portal through walls and relocate you or objects around you, making your way out.

This game is really well design and make you think of various odds and ways to get out of a scenario.

The graphics required is really low and this runs even in a potato (inside game joke).

I do recommend really good game.
There will be cake!
The cake is a lie.
Great puzzle game, amazing story and setting. I love this game, if you haven't played it then fix that.
Still amazing. Got it back on xbox 360 when it first came out and it's still incredible. 11/10. must buy.

이 게임을 처음 플레이하게  되면, 그 참신함에 놀라게 됩니다.

플레이 시간이 길어질수록 너무나 자연스러운 스토리텔링에 놀라게 됩니다.

더욱 오래 플레이하다보면 배경음악과 사운드가 정말 멋지다는 것을 깨닫게 됩니다.

1편을 클리어하고 나면, 유투브에서 엔딩곡을 듣고있는 자신을 발견하게 됩니다.

엔딩곡을 듣고있노라면, 2편을 플레이하고 있는 자신을 발견하게 됩니다.

2편을 플레이하다보면, 1편은 어린애 장난으로 보이게 됩니다. (이 정도로 2편은 쩔어줍니다.)

2편을 클리어하면, 숫자 3을 도통 모르는 밸브를 원망하게 됩니다.

이 평가글을 보게 되는 당신은, 결국 1편부터 지르게 되실 겁니다.
Bom jogo, apesar de pequeno e viciante e divertido!

Portal: Ich hatte einen schönen Nachmittag mit diesem Spiel dann war mir die Story ausgegangen. Das Spiel hat eine sehr gut rübergebrachte Atmosphäre, die Rätsel oder "Tests" haben mich gut unterhalten auch wenn sie nie wirklich schwer waren. Für die Leute die mit den Storytests überhaupt nichts anfangen können die gleichen Tests kann man nochmal in höheren Schwierigkeitsgraden machen wo man dann entweder eine gewisse Zeit beachten muss oder nur eine bestimmte Anzahl an Schritten machen darf. Und für die Leute mit Lattenrost: Man kann die Story noch einmal komplett mit anklickbaren Entwicklerkommentaren durchspielen. Grafik sollte nicht der Grund sein sich das Spiel zu kaufen.

Fazit:
Portal ist ein Klassiker und es Wert einmal gespielt zu werden, wer allerdings etwas sucht mit dem man lange beschäftigt ist sollte sich lieber an Portal 2 wenden. 

P.S. Portal wird nicht fürs Garry´s Mod benötigt.
If you don't already own this game you should.
The cake wasn't a lie. 10/10

Autrefois un peu désavoué pour sa durée de vie, Portal est de ces jeux qui ont franchi le cap des premières critiques, d'autant plus que le soft est aujourd'hui disponible à prix très abordable.

    Le jeu se présente à nous comme un PuzzleGame à la première personne mais Valve l'éditeur n'as pas fait pas les choses à moitié. Voilà la recette de Portal et de son succès : prenez un concept, maitrisez le pour de beaux petis casse-tête en perspective, ajoutez un LevelDesign minimaliste qui va, un temps, cacher la partie immergé d'un iceberg, puis enfin saupoudrez le tout d'un humour robotique décalé et sarcastique à souhait, histoire de vous inquiter toujours un peu plus tout au long de votre parcours en jeu.
 
    Au final Portal se révèle être un petit bijoux vidéo-ludique et s'élève dans l'univers du jeu vidéo au même titre qu'un Hitchcock ou qu'un Boticelli,  car oui tout comme on se souviens de certains pour Eureka ou e=mc² 
ici on gravera dans nos mémoires "The cake is a lie".
Great Game 4.5/5
Juegazo muy recomendado, es supercorto y bastante facil lo que hace que la mecanica sea muy fluida y buena.
Excelent jeu, une 4ième dimension.
Can't beat a classic!

그렇게 어렵지도 않고 그렇다고 너무 쉽지도 않고 재밌는게임.
9.5/10

De los mejores, este y Portal 2 son de mis favoritos

Recomendado al 100%
Tolles Spiel - vorallem der Song am ende *-*
Отличная игра, на отличном движке, Valve умеет делать качественные игры. Прошел на одном дыхании. Легкая смесь шутера и головоломки, ее определенно стоит пройти.
A very addicting game with fun gameplay and makes you use your brain

This is a wonderful game still now. It is an ingenius puzzle game that captured my attention for 5.5 hrs. of solid main story. I love both this and the 2nd Portal and will be playing both many more times.

I enjoyed this game.  It was pretty short but it's better than having a bunch of fillers.  Some people posted negative reviews about it being too repititive but I didn't experience that.  Puzzles were a little easy but still entertaining. Definitely grab the game on sale..  Goes on sale all the time and it's great deal when you get it cheap and worth the $3 you spend.  Look into portal 2 if you have your doubts on it. I've waited forever to play it and the game didn't let me down.  Although it may have too much hype, it is definitely one of those games that many players will remember.
es muy entretenido gracias a sus desfios
My favorite game to play, can always entertain me
While this was a game that has a cool take at puzzle games, I feel as if Valve should rename this piece "Port" fro reflect how short it was. It felt like I covered 1/3rd of a standard game.

шЫдевр! Жаль, что коротковата..
От некоторых уровней дичайше отдает атмосферищей первой халвы. Эту игру стоит занести в список игр, в которые при жизни нужно поиграть каждому.
mastapeece
fun but simple
In 20 years people will still play this game. It is amazing!

A must have. These games are a lot of fun, challenging and hilarious.

You start out as a test subject to a crazy super computer named GLADOS. You are trapped in a giant facility, completing puzzles that GLADOS set forth. You must escape of forever be trapped completing puzzles until you are discarded.

Brilliantly written dialogue (more of a monologue because your character is a mute). The wit is sharp,  and the game play is solid. The puzzles are all do - able.  Some will challenge your mind, others will challenge your abilities and timing.

10/10.
The cake is a lie...

Get harrased by a robot,get shot at by turrets,all while trying to get cake.
10/10
10/10 would rate again.
It took me almost 14 hours to get the "Lab Rat" achievement 6/9.
So original. Great first person puzzler. Funny as all get out robots. Glados makes this game.

El juego es toda una obra maestra. La historia en sí es muy corta pero se disfruta desde el primer minuto. 

Engancha bastante por la historia tan enrevesada y las constantes mentiras por parte de los que te vigilan, es un juego muy peculiar pero muy bueno. 

¡The cake is a lie!

Nota: 9,5/10

本人是在夏日特惠买的这么一款游戏。这是我第一次买这么大型（贵）的游戏，之前都是在苹果商店里买一些小游戏。本来是看到在打五折，就把1和2入了，结果valve在29号又改成二五折，MD，劳资的钱啊~~~（也因此模拟山羊从八折变成了六折）
      说正经的，虽然是几年前的游戏，但是还是很难。因为电脑显卡太烂（以及没有基友和我联机）所以我还没试过2代。但是那个高级房间我到写这篇评测时还没通【本人不看攻略（除了普通关卡）】。这真的是一款很费脑细胞的游戏。能把一款益智游戏和一款动作游戏结合起来，也是一种本事吧。
love this game and they went and did the unthinkable and made the second even better

Portal here, Portal there, Throw a turret up in the air.
10/10
Simple and interesting introduction to the mechanics & setting. Challenging, but doesnt take too long. Play this before the 2nd one.
Très bon jeu pour ma part ! Une ambiance immersive et un exellent game design. Ajoutez une petite touche d'humour, et vous obtenez Portal ;)
Classic. That is all. 5/5

Un gros coup de cœur à la découverte de ce jeu de réflexion à la 3ème personne qui présente un gameplay totalement efficace avec le système de portails téléporteurs. C'est un jeu auquel j'ai joué après avoir entendu parler de portal 2 et de sa note exemplaire. Les 6 heures de jeux sont toutes géniales et la difficulté est la, suffisante mais jamais exagérée au point de  ressentir une frustration. Je n'en garderai qu'une phrase pour conclure : the cake is a lie ;)

Необычная, динамичная и затягивающая игра. Интересные головоломки в сочетании с инновационной механикой геймплея оставляют незабываемые ощущения после прохождения, пусть и очень быстрого. А главный злодей, вернее злодейка, вообще заслуживает отдельной похвалы. Синтетический голос ГЛАДОСа, которого озвучила Эллен Маклейн, еще долго будет звучать у вас в голове. И это хорошо.

10 из 10.
A benchmark for physics-based puzzle games. Great level design, theme and mood for this game. Memorable, iconic, and a classic. A little short, but a great game for its price range. -- [9/10]
Cute and fun, very original with great story writing. A bit too easy without enough content, but it'd be difficult to fill it in to a full game.
As fun as the youtube videos of it seem, which is very.10/10 recommended.

I love it! Several people said I should play it because it's a modern classic that every gamer should have played and now that I have played it I know why. I don't want to say too much about the storyline, but I can say that it is a very rewarding feeling to play it somehow (at least for me). It ends too quickly

10/10 Portal is Perfection.
Juego entretenido donde los haya.

Una primera parte relativamente sencilla (al menos para alguien que no está acostumbrado a los juegos de acción y/o en primera persona), pero sin duda muy adictiva. Hay puzzles muy sencillos y otros que requieren bastante más imaginación, pero al menos no te quedas irremediablemente enganchado en según qué partes.
Otro gran punto a favor es el excepcional doblaje en español, que me parece de premio.

Großer Spaß vorprogrammiert! Humorvolles, abwechslungsreiches Puzzle-Spiel, welches das Rätsel-Genre auffrischt und revolutioniert.

Pro:- Schritt für Schritt wird man an die Features des Spiels herangeführt
      - abwechslungsreiche Levelgestaltung
      - humorvolle Sprecheransagen
      - interessante Secrets

Contra:- etwas zu kurz
            - nach einiger Einspielzeit vergleichsweise einfach (wird aber durch die schwereren Versionen der Levels kompensiert)

Für den jetzigen Kaufpreis ein absolutes Muss!!!

Что такое Portal? На распродаже я купил себе пак из 2-ух частей Portal. Установив эти 2 шедевра я начал их конечно же проходить. Начал естественно с 1-ой части.  И что вы думаете? Я понял, что круче, чем эти 2 части нету ничего на свете, и знаете почему? Многим кажется, что здесь однообразные уровни. Ничего интересного на 1-ый взгляд. НО. Поиграв, вы осознаете, что деньги не потрачены зря. Вы влюбитесь в ГЛаДОС и главную героиню, в сюжетную линию и скрытый смысл, вы полюбите всё, что с ней связано...
great game, and for $5 really worth it. Bit short unfortunately, will definitely be buying portal 2
Fantastic game with excellent mechanics. 10/10.
Cooles Spiel! Ich finds sehr unterhaltsam.
This game is, and will remain, a classic.

One of my favorite games of all time. A fun game that has a very interesting backstory that you learn as you play through the game. Though this is a pretty short game, its definitally worth playing. As soon as you're finished you're going to want to play Portal 2 which is longer and develops the backstory much more. 10/10
portal is a great game if you like solving puzzles i mostly like for how it is the story not much story until you get to the last testing chamber
